name: Hilton Cologne

reviews.title: nice hotel,good location
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel while visiting the exhibition and has a perfect location central to everthing.

I reserverd a deluxe room which was spacious,clean and comfortable. The restaurant is very good especially the breakfast and the bar/lounge has a good atmosphere with fast friendly seavice. For visiting cologne this is the perfect hotel.
reviews.title: First Choice
Hilton at Cologne
reviews.text: Stayed here earlier this year and back again for business in the Leverkusen area. Excellent staff and service, close to train station, cathedral, river, and restaurants. Very comfortable, clean, and spacious room with wood floors. Always sleep well at this hotel - not always the case when traveling. I do not recall a better breakfast buffet. This hotel does it right.
I have stayed at this hotel few years ago and liked it so much that am returning here again. Love the location, food, and friendly staff.
reviews.title: Good Location - Nice Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed over night here whilst attending an exhibition in Cologne, We had arrived early and even though the hotel was 100% full (so we were told) our rooms were ready. Very comfortable, normal Hilton standard, although an update would perhaps be required, haven't been in a hotel for a while that still had CRT TVs...
reviews.title: WHAT A TREAT

reviews.text: Stayed at the Hilton from the 29th-1Jan for the New Year,can't really fault the place or the staff but the attitudes of some of the guests was appalling.
reviews.title: just a bit too snobby

likes.disliked: — Stuck up intolerant and rude guests

reviews.text: I am relatively new to booking this standard of hotel but I have to say that I stayed at the Raddisson last year and felt much more comfortable,having said that the location of the Hilton would win every time but if you dont like being stared at at breakfast for the 'crime' of having children with you then think twice.
reviews.title: Perfect for Xmas Markets

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cologne itself is a great city and easily explored on foot or by the excellent transport system.The Dom,The Zoo,Chocolate Museum etc are all worth visiting but for me the best places for the real Cologne are the numerous Brauhauses which are where all of the population of Cologne seem to congregate at some time or another,and for good reason as both the food and drink is excellent quality and good value.Whilst each one is different 2 outstanding ones for me are Peters Brauhaus and Sunner im Walfisch where we spent New Years Eve and were well looked after until the wee small hours including the 'kinder' who were treated like royalty all night a refreshing change to the attitude of the British liscensed establishment.
reviews.title: A perfect stay

likes.liked: — Everything - the location, the people, the room, value for money

reviews.title: Great Location...not five star though
reviews.text: The number one thing is the location...it is a block and half from the train station.
But the beds are rock hard...and I went with an upgraded room!!
reviews.title: I should've stayed longer than a night

likes.disliked: — the potential cost of anything extra

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: But everything else is very nice...clean rooms, nice lobby and food is pretty good.
reviews.title: Very confortable stay. Great food!

likes.liked: — Breakfast buffet, dinner in the hotel restaurant and location.

reviews.text: Make sure you get a room including Breakfast...its like 38 bucks
reviews.title: Great location, more a 4 than a 5 star though

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I just finished (and enjoyed) a one night stay at the Hilton hotel in Cologne.
reviews.title: It's a Hilton!

likes.disliked: — No restaurant available to residents due to business use.

reviews.text: This Hilton is a 2 minute walk from the Dom station & Cathedral. Facilities are very good with a Bar where you can get a snack to a Resturant with excellent menu if a little pricey. However for dinner there are numerous resturants within a few minutes walk that offer very good quality at reasonable prices, particularily down by the Rhine. Gym & Spa are also very good.
reviews.title: Koln centre hotel

reviews.text: I've had a few issues with my room as well as service, that are not worthy of a five-star property.
reviews.title: Definitely not a five-star hotel

reviews.text: 1. A friend left an envelope containing a birthday gift for my husband for us at the front desk two days before we checked out. Not only did the hotel fail to deliver this to us - they did not call or leave a message regarding this package. This is totally unacceptable. No five-star hotel I've stayed at have exhibited such negligence. The five star hotels we've stayed in normally either call to inform guests of envelopes and packages or actually deliver them to the room. Not at this Hilton. Now we are home and have only found out about this gift left at the hotel after the fact. The hotel, at its own expense, should Fedex this to us. Let's see if the guest relations manager offers to do this after reading this review.
reviews.title: Excellent base when doing business in and around Cologne!

reviews.text: 2. The shower in the shower stall was not working when I arrived in my room. No water supply and clogged drains, judging from a pool of stale water in the drain. The drain cover was removed from the drain - as though the housekeeper meant to report it to maintenance and forgot. I read an earlier review about another guest who had the same problem. This leads me to believe that this issue is not uncommon at this hotel.
reviews.title: Great city centre location!

reviews.text: 3. The mini-bar refrigerator was out of order. No cold drinks nor use of the refrigerator space to be had.
reviews.title: Great Location, Nice Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel was not apart of our itinerary but we found ourselves here after we missed a connecting train. The location is great (a 5 minute walk from the train station) and they were able to accomadate us last minute. It is a little pricey but the room was spacious and decorated in a modern style.
reviews.title: Convenient location

reviews.text: Television was not working required call to front desk and tech person to solve problem. Ice machine was not working the day of arrival went to front desk to advise them. That evening after sight seeing tried machine again still not working. Was disappointed upon arrival that WI-FI had to purchased for access. Have been in numerous hotels throughout the states and Europe with free access. Told this to personnel as we checked out was told that the Germany governent requires charging. Strange that at the airport free Wi-Fi was available.
reviews.title: Management attention required

reviews.text: Would not recommend hotel to associates personnel are not friendly except for the bellman. Management needs a procedure to assess services such as T.V., ice machine and resturant servers. Hotel is suited for business travelers not vacationers.
reviews.title: Need some improvements to be worth 5*

reviews.text: We travelled as a big family to Cologne to celebrate my little sister's birthday and stayed there for 2 nights in 2 King Guest Rooms. The hotel had a prestigious appearance and the rooms were lovely decorated. The cathedral as well as city center could be reached within 2 minutes.
reviews.title: Super!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When we arrived, my friend and I had to park the car, so my parents checked into their room first. It seems as though names were not given in order by booking.com), so the receptionist couldn't find the reservation at first, but quickly did so and gave them a room on the 4th floor. Later when we came back after parking the car, the same thing happened with my name and we got a room on an entirely different floor. After finding out that the rooms were too far away from each other, we requested a room on the 1st floor and we received a new one within 10 minutes.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel with an Excellent Location
Location, location, location
reviews.text: Could not ask for a better location. One block from the main train station, and the Cathedral, and the main tourist sites. The great location trumps almost all else. The hotel itself was also very good. We were in a deluxe room that was quite big, with a large and very well equipped bathroom. Breakfast buffet in the restaurant was excellent. Would have no hesitation staying here again.
First trip to Cologne this June 2012 where we stayed at the Hilton hotel.
reviews.title: A great stay in the Hilton Cologne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a reasonable price for a Hilton & me and my friends were not disappointed.
reviews.title: modern, great location

reviews.text: The rooms are a good size cleaned every day, we did not eat here but has a nice bar area with comes with complementary peanuts including green ones which were very nice, beers are a little more expensive than some of the other bars but is still worth a visit to this bar with another bar called the ice bar next door.
reviews.title: A very good hotel - BUT no free WiFi !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The sauna & gym are well worth a trip the sauna & steam room was great & very relaxing just be prepared as the Germans do like to go naked ( strange mushroom shapes)
reviews.title: Standard Hotel in Good Location for Tourists

description: Situated in the heart of downtown Cologne, the Hilton Cologne hotel is ideally located for the Cologne business district and for some of the city’s most popular tourist attractions. Boasting contemporary style in a istoric setting this Old Town hotel allows guests to make the most of their stay in the city.Stay connected to friends, colleagues and the wider world through the business center and WiFi access. After a busy day in Cologne you can find an escape in the fully equipped fitness center.
